parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the bill estimate to update.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the updated bill estimate.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The updated name of the bill estimate.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of the updated bill estimate.

nested_items.name: failureMessage
nested_items.description: An error message if the bill estimate update failed.

nested_items.name: billInterval
nested_items.description: The time period covered by the updated bill estimate.

nested_items.name: start
nested_items.description: The start date and time of the interval.

nested_items.name: end
nested_items.description: The end date and time of the interval.

nested_items.name: costSummary
nested_items.description: A summary of the updated estimated costs.

nested_items.name: totalCostDifference
nested_items.description: The total difference in cost between the estimated and historical costs.

nested_items.name: historicalCost
nested_items.description: The historical cost amount.

nested_items.name: amount
nested_items.description: The numeric value of the cost.

nested_items.name: currency
nested_items.description: The currency code for the cost amount.

nested_items.name: estimatedCost
nested_items.description: The estimated cost amount.

nested_items.name: amount
nested_items.description: The numeric value of the cost.

nested_items.name: currency
nested_items.description: The currency code for the cost amount.

nested_items.name: serviceCostDifferences
nested_items.description: A breakdown of cost differences by Amazon Web Services service.

nested_items.name: historicalCost
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: historicalCost
nested_items.description: The historical cost amount.

nested_items.name: amount
nested_items.description: The numeric value of the cost.

nested_items.name: currency
nested_items.description: The currency code for the cost amount.

nested_items.name: estimatedCost
nested_items.description: The estimated cost amount.

nested_items.name: amount
nested_items.description: The numeric value of the cost.

nested_items.name: currency
nested_items.description: The currency code for the cost amount.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the bill estimate was originally created.

nested_items.name: expiresAt
nested_items.description: The updated expiration timestamp for the bill estimate.
